message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about we try $107.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105 again?
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go down to $105. I'm willing to make another concession, though. How about we try $108?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $106?
I'm still not willing to go down to $106, Bob. I think we're getting close, though. How about we try $109?
I'm not getting any younger, and I really want to make a decision. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about $107?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $108.50?
I understand you're tired of going back and forth, but I'm not willing to go above $108. I'll meet you at $108, and that's my final offer.
